title: Card flipping at the Lunar Revel Shop.
body:
I flipped all my cards and the 3rd card turned out to be a discount on Dreadknight Garen at 70% off, and I was looking to buy.
But before doing that I had a couple of games first, then went back to Lunar Revel Shop to find that the 3rd card had been flipped back over, as I re-flipped the card it changed and turned in to Heartseeker Vayne at 70% discount.
Now I know that the Lunar Revel Shop is a gift in itself but I really feel like I got ripped off because out of all of them I wanted that Dreadknight Garen skin the most.

Tried going to the riot support site to make a complaint but was unable do to sign in failure.
Just hope that this doesn't happen in the future and hope I get my original discount card back, because this is my favourite game and things like this make it less enjoyable.

replies.body:
Hey Ricca,

Some others are seeing this and I don't know what's causing it or when it will be fixed, but fear not, I have good news for you!

You can get Dreadknight Garen *free* through Riot's social media promotions! Just head over to [Twitter](https://twitter.com/LeagueOfLegends) and follow the steps;

https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202083184-Promotional-Content-Free-Swag-#h2q6

Hey thanks for the help.

The code I received was not valid but thanks anyways.
Submit a [Support Ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and they'll help you out with that. It's better to wait for them to give it to you free than to pay for it, right?
He already said he's having sign in error for the support site. He's not the only one having this problem, too.
